# Introduction
```{r, include=FALSE}
# install packages
source("scripts/01_packages.R")
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
query <- "SELECT s.name, COUNT(*) FROM atlas.records r JOIN atlas.records_validation_status s ON (s.id=r.validation_status) GROUP BY s.id ORDER BY status"
data <- dbGetQuery(db, query)

data$status <- factor(data$status, levels = unique(data$status))
```

## Quantitative description of the database 
**This information is valid for the date of build of this document.**

```{r, include=FALSE}
kable(data, caption = "Records count according to the status of validity")
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
ggplot(data, aes(x = status, y = "count of records", fill = status)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Records count according to the status of validity",
       x = "Status (called semafor)",
       y = "Records count")
```
